title: Ep. 206 - Miss Congeniality with Alexis Daria
itunes:title: Ep. 206 - Miss Congeniality with Alexis Daria
description:
Hey HBs! https://alexisdaria.com/ (Alexis Daria) is here to tell us all about her new release, A Lot Like Adios! It's the second in her Primas of Power series and IT'S DELICIOUS! Second chance romance, family redemption, fan fiction, and super steamy!!! It's everything we wanted and more. We get to cackle about Miss Congeniality and, even though it was *obviously* made 20 years ago, it holds up! Basically, ~we think it's goooorgeous, we want to kiiiiiss it, we want to smooooch it, we want to marrrryyyyyy it!~
 Bonus Content: *Bing Boong Bong* FBI Times with Erin, federal manicurists, the magic of William Shatner's announcer voice, and the generation of young women who learned the SING method of self defense from this movie! 
 Lady Loves: 
 Alexis: Fable Bands. Headbands based on books! 
 Erin: Get your eyes checked (or whatever you're putting off). Do it! 
 Melody: Embrace whoever you need to be in this moment. Need to spend 3 days and emailing and calling school administrators and the entire school board to get a COVID safety plan published? Pull your hair back and get to it. You'll only find yourself *slightly* unrecognizable. 
 Make sure to follow Alexis Daria! Instagram | https://twitter.com/alexisdaria?s=20 (Twitter)
 Check out Mel's new podcast BONKERS ROMANCE!! You can subscribe wherever you listen to podcasts. And follow on Instagram, Twitter, and Facebook.
 Subscribe! Rate! Review! Tell all your friends :)
 Get more content on PATREON!!
 Sign up for our Newsletter! 
 MERCH! Teepublic, https://chicalookate.myshopify.com/collections/heaving-bosom (Chicaloo Kate), Redbubble
 Make your life better and hire Natalie to assist you!!!
 And follow our socials: 
 Instagram: @heavingbosoms
 Twitter: @heaving_bosom
Mentioned in this episode:
Check out Literary Souvenirs for all your Bookish and BTS Merch! 
Bookish Merch IG : http://instagram.com/literarysouvenirs
BTS Merch IG : https://instagram.com/btssouvenirs
Twitter : https://twitter.com/abooktrotter
https://heaving-bosoms.captivate.fm/literarysouvenirs (Literary Souvenirs Etsy!)
Preorder Naima Simone X Friends Book Boyfriend Box!!
This box has EVERYTHING you could ever want in a book boyfriend from Tessa Bailey, Avery Flynn, Farrah Rochon, Jayci Lee, Kennedy Ryan, Adriana Herrera, and Naima Simone.
You can look forward to paperbacks, signed book plates, limited edition book boyfriend mugs, the book boyfriend pajamas/loungewear, bookmarks and more!
Tiers include:
- Cinnamon Roll - $114.99
- The Alpha - - $169.99 
Enter the promo code BONKERS10 at checkout to receive $10 off!!! 
ONLY AVAILABLE UNTIL OCT 10, 2022!
If you have any questions, email orders@honeymagnolia.co.
https://heaving-bosoms.captivate.fm/nsbookboyfriends (Naima's Book Boyfriends)
September in the Temple!
- This month we're back with Katee regaling us with more Fertile in My Ex-Boyfriend’s Dungeon (and we discover an actual hard limit for Katee!), and Hannah Whitten is going to stop by to give us all her best spooky season recs. 
- In Book Club news, everyone in the Joy Bringer and Celebrant tiers can download their ebooks of MY WICKED PRINCE by Molly O’Keefe and the entire audiobook collection of COURT OF THE VAMPIRE QUEEN by Katee Robert! 
- And finally, Joy Bringers and Celebrants can check out all the digital art we’ve created for the Temple! It’s all on one convenient page waiting for you. 
https://heaving-bosoms.captivate.fm/temple (Bonkers Temple of Defiant Joy! )
content:encoded:
Hey HBs! Alexis Daria is here to tell us all about her new release, A Lot Like Adios! It's the second in her Primas of Power series and IT'S DELICIOUS! Second chance romance, family redemption, fan fiction, and super steamy!!! It's everything we wanted and more. We get to cackle about Miss Congeniality and, even though it was *obviously* made 20 years ago, it holds up! Basically, ~we think it's goooorgeous, we want to kiiiiiss it, we want to smooooch it, we want to marrrryyyyyy it!~

Bonus Content: *Bing Boong Bong* FBI Times with Erin, federal manicurists, the magic of William Shatner's announcer voice, and the generation of young women who learned the SING method of self defense from this movie! 

Lady Loves: 

Alexis: Fable Bands. Headbands based on books! 

Erin: Get your eyes checked (or whatever you're putting off). Do it! 

Melody: Embrace whoever you need to be in this moment. Need to spend 3 days and emailing and calling school administrators and the entire school board to get a COVID safety plan published? Pull your hair back and get to it. You'll only find yourself *slightly* unrecognizable. 

Make sure to follow Alexis Daria! Instagram | Twitter

Check out Mel's new podcast BONKERS ROMANCE!! You can subscribe wherever you listen to podcasts. And follow on Instagram, Twitter, and Facebook.

September in the Temple!

- This month we're back with Katee regaling us with more Fertile in My Ex-Boyfriend’s Dungeon (and we discover an actual hard limit for Katee!), and Hannah Whitten is going to stop by to give us all her best spooky season recs. - In Book Club news, everyone in the Joy Bringer and Celebrant tiers can download their ebooks of MY WICKED PRINCE by Molly O’Keefe and the entire audiobook collection of COURT OF THE VAMPIRE QUEEN by Katee Robert! - And finally, Joy Bringers and Celebrants can check out all the digital art we’ve created for the Temple!
